document_data.mainbody:
Stonesmith Hammerhand was a dwarf noble and commander of the city guard of the city of Orvyltar in Ulgarth around 1367 DR. Stonesmith was one of the few dwarven nobles in the kingdom.
Stonesmith commanded 500 men-at-arms and three cavalry troops, as well as the citys defenses. Stonesmith lovingly maintained the powerful ballistae mounted on the towers that overlooked Copper Bay.
